entry.title: Indonesian Exchange Pintu Raises $113M to Be 'Coinbase of Southeast Asia'
entry.summary: Investors are bullish on the startup and its founder despite the current bear market.

entry.title: English Premier League Files Crypto and NFT Trademarks
entry.summary: New trademark filings hint at expanded digital markets for the the top tier of England's football pyramid.

entry.title: Epic Games CEO Bashes Crypto Exchanges Over Fake Fortnite Token
entry.summary: Sweeney took a shot at decentralized exchanges like PancakeSwap for "enabling" trading of the unauthorized token.

entry.title: SEC Targets Binance's BNB ICO for Potential Violations: Report
entry.summary: The launch of Binance Coin (BNB) five years ago fostered the world's largest crypto exchange. Today, it's getting a fresh look from U.S. regulators, according to Bloomberg.

entry.title: Weekly Bitcoin Inflows Totaled $126M as Institutions Keep 'Buying the Dip'
entry.summary: And for a ninth straight week, Ethereum-based funds saw outflows.

entry.title: Crypto IRA Company Sues Gemini Over $36M Theft of Bitcoin, Ethereum
entry.summary: IRA Financial Trust says New York-based exchange is to blame for the massive February hack. Gemini denies the allegations.

entry.title: Ethereum NFT Game Illuvium Sells Over $72M in Digital Land Plots
entry.summary: The role-playing game’s first land sale on Immutable X yields a huge stash of crypto, even in a bear market for NFTs.

entry.title: Justin Aversano’s Quantum Opens Physical NFT Gallery in LA to ‘Uplift Other Artists’
entry.summary: Aversano's L.A. hub, the first of potentially many Quantum Spaces, is designed for fostering real-world Web3 communities.

entry.title: At Least $2.4B in Crypto Has Been Laundered Through Binance: Report
entry.summary: A Reuters report says $2.4B in stolen funds have been laundered through Binance. The exchange calls it a "woefully misinformed op-ed."

entry.title: Twitter May Not Get Its Crypto-Friendly Owner: Elon Musk Seeks Exit From Deal
entry.summary: A letter contends that Musk is within his right “to terminate the merger agreement” should Twitter withhold information about bot activity.

entry.title: Binance Labs Makes Undisclosed ‘Strategic Investment’ in PancakeSwap
entry.summary: Binace Labs has announced a strategic investment in PancakeSwap’s governance and utility token CAKE.

entry.title: Justin Sun’s Terra-like Stablecoin Now Boasts Backing in Bitcoin, Tether, Tron
entry.summary: Launched first as an algorithmic stablecoin, Tron's USDD has changed its operating model to avoid possible collapse like Terra’s UST.

entry.title: Epic Games Store’s First NFT Game Is Gala’s Wild West Shooter GRIT
entry.summary: Gala Games plants a Web3 flag in the popular PC marketplace Epic Games Store with plans to roll out its battle royale game this year.

entry.title: Aussie Investors Have Already Lost Over $80M to Crypto Scams This Year
entry.summary: Total cryptocurrency scam losses by Australians in the first four months of this year alone amounted to $81.5 million, according to the country’s consumer watchdog.

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Jump 5% as Crypto Market Rebounds
entry.summary: Bitcoin and Ethereum, the top two cryptocurrencies by market capitalization, saw a 5% spike in price in the last 24 hours.

entry.title: 'Move-to-Earn' Game Stepn Hit With DDOS Attacks—Again
entry.summary: The popular Web3 app suggested its users "take some rest" while engineers worked on the issue.

entry.title: Bored Apes Co-Founder Criticizes Discord After NFTs Worth 200 Ethereum Snatched in Exploit
entry.summary: Others have criticized criticism of the platform, saying it shouldn’t be blamed if not used correctly.

entry.title: Roughly 70% of $1 Billion Lost to Crypto Scammers Since 2021 Was Bitcoin: FTC
entry.summary: The median individual loss reported was about $2,600, but that figure for victims in their 70s was nearly $12,000.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Elon Musk and Dogecoin Co-Creator Jackson Palmer Exchange Words
entry.summary: Elsewhere, Vitalik Buterin ponders an anti-crypto letter sent to U.S. lawmakers, and New York's governor considers a two-year mining ban.

entry.title: What It Means to Be Chinese in Crypto
entry.summary: Tech giants have become tech dwarves in China in the wake of COVID and a government crackdown on cutting-edge tech.

entry.title: Jilted Would-Be Coinbase Employees Vent Online After Jobs They Accepted Are Eliminated
entry.summary: A lot of very talented people are very upset. And some now face harsh deadlines to gets jobs or lose their immigration status.

entry.title: Crypto Winter Layoffs Hit Hard—But Won’t Kill the Industry
entry.summary: Big crypto companies like Coinbase, Gemini, Bitso and more are battening down the hatches. Will they emerge from it leaner and stronger?

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Markets Flatten, Kanye Files Web3 Trademarks, Eurovision Winners Donate Ethereum to Ukraine
entry.summary: Also: The Bank of England announced plans for stablecoin “oversight,” and The Weeknd is teaming up with Binance.

entry.title: What ‘Responsibility’ Do Token Airdrop Recipients Have?
entry.summary: Recipients of Optimism’s token quickly dumped it, sending the price down 82% and angering many community members.

entry.title: ApeCoin Community Looks Set to Stay on Ethereum—For Now
entry.summary: An ApeCoin proposal is polling the community on whether they want to stay within Ethereum. So far, it’s been a resounding “yes.”

entry.title: Twin Flames Creator Justin Aversano Opens Physical NFT Space in LA
entry.summary: Quantum's Justin Aversano sits down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at the new Quantum Spaces in Santa Monica, CA. Justin discusses the gallery, his new project Doppelganger, and what's next for real-world NFT exhibitions.

entry.title: Snoop Dogg to Open Bored Ape NFT-Themed Dessert Restaurant
entry.summary: Dr. Bombay’s Sweet Exploration will use the rapper’s Bored Ape Yacht Club avatar to anchor a Los Angeles eatery.

entry.title: LatAm Bitcoin Exchanges Announce Major Layoffs to Prepare for Crypto Winter
entry.summary: Latin American cryptocurrency companies batten down the hatches, joining their U.S. peers in response to seismic shifts in the market.

entry.title: NBA Crypto Sponsorship Spending Increased 7,300% This Season: Report
entry.summary: Seeing logos for crypto companies everywhere in pro basketball this season? There are at least 130 million reasons for that.

entry.title: Kathy Hochul Will Decide Fate of Bitcoin Mining in New York
entry.summary: The New York State Senate has approved a bill that would create a 2-year moratorium on Bitcoin mining. Gov. Hochul has 10 days to sign or veto it.

entry.title: Ice Cube: BIG3 Re-Launching Its Ethereum NFT Team Stakes to Make Them ‘Juicy Enough’
entry.summary: The 3-on-3 basketball league is adding more features to its team ownership NFTs following issues with May’s original mint.

entry.title: NFTs with Utility: STEPN, NFTY Labs, Wax, and Gomu Predict What's Next
entry.summary: Shiti Manghani of STEPN, Ty Blackard of NFTY Labs, William Quigley of Wax blockchain, and Spencer Yang of Gomu talk with Decrypt's Dan Roberts about how the next era of NFTs will have utility and real-world use cases, as part of CoinMarketCap's The Capital virtual conference.

entry.title: Japan Passes Stablecoin Bill Aimed at Protecting Crypto Investors
entry.summary: Japan’s Parliament has passed a new law that would create a regulatory framework for stablecoins, essentially defining them as digital money.

entry.title: CFTC Charges Gemini for Providing 'Material False' Statements on Bitcoin Futures Product
entry.summary: Gemini has been charged by the CFTC with misleading the regulator during the exchange’s Bitcoin futures approval process.

entry.title: New York Senate Passes Two-Year Bitcoin Mining Moratorium
entry.summary: The New York State Senate passed a bill that would impose a two-year moratorium on any new fossil-fueled crypto mining operations.

entry.title: Coinbase Freezes Hiring and Will Rescind Accepted Job Offers
entry.summary: The crypto crash and fears of a Crypto Winter have prompted Coinbase to get even more aggressive in cutting costs.

entry.title: Johnny Depp Ethereum NFTs Surge After Actor Wins Defamation Suit Against Amber Heard
entry.summary: The NFT collection on OpenSea features images of several figures that Depp calls “friends and heroes.”

entry.title: Ethereum Founder Vitalik Buterin Muses On Crypto-Skeptic Letter to Washington
entry.summary: It’s normal that “various classes of normies and often soon grifters move in over time” as movements like crypto grow, Vitalik said.

entry.title: Binance and The Weeknd Launch a ‘Crypto-Powered’ World Tour
entry.summary: The Weeknd will launch various NFT collections as Binance comes aboard the After Hours ‘Til Dawn concert tour.

entry.title: Crypto 401(k) Provider ForUsAll Sues US Department of Labor
entry.summary: ForUsAll is suing the Department of Labor after the regulator discouraged retirement planners from turning to crypto.

entry.title: FTX Overtook Coinbase in Bitcoin Volume for First Time Ever in May: Report
entry.summary: Crypto exchange Coinbase processed a record-high number of transactions in May, however, it still fell behind FTX in terms of trading volume.

entry.title: Kraken's Dan Held Talks Bitcoin Maximalism and Crypto Winter
entry.summary: Dan Held, a longtime Bitcoin influencer and now head of growth marketing at crypto exchange Kraken, talks to Decrypt's Dan Roberts about Bitcoin maximalists (he calls himself a "mostamalist"), NFTs, and Crypto Winter as part of CoinMarketCap's The Capital virtual conference.

entry.title: Gemini Lays Off 10% of Staff to Prepare for Crypto Winter
entry.summary: "The crypto revolution is well underway and its impact will continue to be profound," the brothers wrote on Gemini's blog. "But its trajectory has been anything but gradual or predictable."

entry.title: What Is Runner? 'Hunger Games' Co-Producer's Web3 Sci-Fi Project
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin speaks with Hollywood producer Bryan Unkeless and team members Bryce Anderson and Blaise Hemingway about their Web3 sci-fi project Runner, starting with an NFT project and a comic book all about racing.

entry.title: ‘The Irishman’ Exec Producer Niels Juul Gets Into NFTs
entry.summary: Decrypt’s Kate Irwin talks to veteran Hollywood film producer Niels Juul about why he’s going all in on NFTs and Web3.

entry.title: Decrypt at Cannes: Decentralized Pictures CEO Leo Matchett Talks Hollywood Embracing Crypto
entry.summary: Decrypt's Stephen Graves heads to the 2022 Cannes Film Festival, where he sits down with Leo Matchett of Decentralized Pictures, the Roman Coppola-backed nonprofit using crypto and blockchain voting to find, fund, and produce films.

entry.title: Decrypt at Cannes: 'Calladita' Director Miguel Faus on Funding Films with NFTs
entry.summary: Decrypt's Stephen Graves is on the scene at the 2022 Cannes Film Festival, where he spoke to Miguel Faus, director of the film "Calladita," who funded his movie by selling NFTs to backers including NounsDAO.

entry.title: gm: DraftKings Goes Crypto
entry.summary: Episode 10 of the gm podcast: Crypto and sports continue to converge, and one of the best examples is DraftKings. CEO Jason Robins joins Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts to talk about how DraftKings is embracing NFTs as prizes, when the company might accept crypto for entry fees and bets, and how his experience dealing with regulators and lawmakers mirrors what crypto companies are now going through in Washington.

entry.title: Decrypt Learn: What is Web3?
entry.summary: Web3 is the next evolution of the Internet, built on blockchains. Blockchains are a new kind of database, making new types of peer-to-peer apps possible. This has profound implications for humanity.

entry.title: How Brands Are Creating Immersive Experiences in the Metaverse
entry.summary: In Episode 10 of the Navigating the Metaverse podcast, hosted by Cathy Hackl and Tommaso di Bartolo, Andrew Hayward of Decrypt and Josh Roth of Decrypt Studios discuss how companies are approaching the metaverse, where it could all go next, and what it was like to watch a movie in a Lamborghini on the moon.

entry.title: #DecryptLIVE: Crypto crash roundtable
entry.summary: Crypto bloodbath! How low will the major coins go, and what about Terra and stablecoins? Decrypt’s Dan Roberts, Jeff Benson, Stacy Elliott and Jason Nelson will discuss the news and parse through what’s happened and what might happen next.

entry.title: Infura Co-Founder E.G. Galano Talks Otherside NFT Mint, Ethereum Gas Fees
entry.summary: Infura co-founder and general manager E.G. Galano talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin about what Infura does, how the Bored Ape Yacht Club could have avoided the hiccups with its Otherdeed NFT mint, other hot NFT collections like Moonbirds, and Ethereum's gas fee issues.

entry.title: Decrypt Learn: What Is Ethereum 2.0? Ethereum's Consensus Layer and Merge Explained
entry.summary: The long-planned upgrade to Ethereum aims to improve the network’s scalability and security by switching to a proof of stake consensus mechanism.
